function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate visualization of virus transmission behaviors and impacts","Impact":"Misunderstanding of virus transmission and ineffective spatial contamination management","Mitigation":"Develop more comprehensive visualization methods, provide additional interaction techniques, and perform multiple simulation runs","Technologies":"3D visualization tools, temporal filters, interactive visualization techniques","People":"Non-expert participants, stakeholders in spatial contamination management","Owner":"Researchers, visualization experts"},{"Description":"Lack of longitudinal overview in 3D situated visualization","Impact":"Inability to track changes and developments over time, missing out on long-term patterns and trends","Mitigation":"Implement hybrid visualization method combining 3D visualization with temporal filters, automate view point adjustments and visualization methods based on time intervals","Technologies":"Hybrid visualization methods, temporal filters, interactive visualization techniques","People":"Researchers, visualization experts","Owner":"Researchers, visualization experts"},{"Description":"Effects of randomness in human behaviors not adequately addressed","Impact":"Inability to identify and mitigate patterns and trends across multiple simulation runs, ineffective management of human behavior impacts on space contamination","Mitigation":"Perform multiple simulation runs, explore interactive visualization techniques to represent converging aspects of data","Technologies":"Interactive visualization techniques, multiple simulation runs","People":"Stakeholders in spatial contamination management, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, visualization experts"}]}
